RawLine: ITEM_05132_Tip,製藥藥材，止血、解毒、袪瘀活血，味苦，性寒。{p}{p}合成難度：{color=#ff0000}3{/color}。,制药药材，止血、解毒、袪瘀活血，味苦，性寒。{p}{p}合成难度：{color=#ff0000}3{/color}。

Items.r: 製藥藥材，止血、解毒、袪瘀活血，味苦，性寒。{p}{p}合成難度：{color=#ff0000}3{/color}。
Items.c: 製藥藥材,止血、解毒、袪瘀活血,味苦,性寒。合成難度：3。
Items.mt: A medicinal herb that stops bleeding, detoxifies the blood, expels blood stasis and invigorates the blood, bitter in taste and cold in nature. Synthesis Difficulty: 3.
